traits.name: Pack Leader
entries: The aurumvorax's allies have advantage on attack rolls while within 10 feet of the aurumvorax, provided it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Tunneler
entries: The aurumvorax can burrow through solid rock and metal at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The aurumvorax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage. If the target is a creature wearing armor of any type, the aurumvorax gains one of the following benefits of its choice:

actions.name: Frenzy
entries: The aurumvorax has advantage on attack rolls until start of its next turn.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can't use its Claw attack on another target, and when it moves, it can drag the {@condition grappled} creature with it, without the aurumvorax's speed being halved.
